vsParam:
What Sensei gave you [px] are
a "Healing Salve" and a "Puni Ball", right?

Puni Ball is an Attack Item,
when used in battles, it can deal damage to your enemy.

Whenever you [c][DF1FB2FF]cannot damage the enemy[-][/c]
or [c][DF1FB2FF]your skills are unavailable[-][/c], it is a very useful item.

It is very easy to make, yet very useful. That's why I recommend
you synthesize them when there are enough ingredients.

For this time, let's equip the Puni Ball.
Please, select the Puni Ball.
